attributes.action: to close down such Television channels as ITV Play and its broadcasts such as Glitterball on ITV1.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Programs broadcast late at night on Channels such as ITV1 and Channel 5 that report to be fair are unfair and another way capitalism can take advantage of working class people. These shows contain unfair questions with random answers. People have become addicted to them and the limit on them (100+ calls) is also unfair. We petition the government to remove these cheap ,but highly profitable debt creaters masqurading as entertainment, TV shows.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
